info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.operate.bgp
info.description:
Proto definitions for BGP peer information. Peer status and routes exchanged with
peer will be displayed.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site

get.description: Show routes exported / imported via BGP

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace for which the request is sent (system)

parameters.name: site
parameters.description:
Site Name

x-example: "value"
Name of the site

peer.description: Peer from which the path is received
peer.title: Peer

bgpBGPPeersResponse.description: List of BGP peers and their status from all ver instances in the site
bgpBGPPeersResponse.title: BGP Peers Response

ver.description: Peer Status information from each ver instance
ver.title: Ver Peer Status

exported.description: List of Routes exported via BGP
exported.title: Exported Routes

imported.description: List of Routes imported via BGP
imported.title: Imported Routes

bgpBGPRoutesResponse.description: All BGP routes per instance per table from all ver instances in the site
bgpBGPRoutesResponse.title: BGP Routes Response

ver.description: Routes per instance per table from each ver instance
ver.title: Ver Routing Instances

bgpBgpPeerProtocolState.description:
Status of BGP connection to this Peer

Connection state is not known
Connection state is Idle
Connection state is Connecting
Connection state is Active
Connection state is Open Sent
Connection state is Open Confirm
Connection state is Established
Connection state is Clearing
Connection state is Deleted
bgpBgpPeerProtocolState.title: BGP Protocol Status

bgpBgpPeerStatusType.description: Most recently observed status of the BGP Peering session
bgpBgpPeerStatusType.title: BGP Peer Status

advertised_prefix_count.description: Number of prefixes advertised to the peer
advertised_prefix_count.title: Advertised Prefix Count

connection_flap_count.description: Number of times the connection moved from Established state to a non Established state
connection_flap_count.title: Connection Flap Count

interface_name.description: Name of the interface through which peering is being done
interface_name.title: Interface Name

local_address.description: Local address used by the VER to connect to the peer
local_address.title: Local Address

peer_asn.description: Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the Peer
peer_asn.title: Peer ASN

received_prefix_count.description: Number of prefixes received from the peer
received_prefix_count.title: Received Prefix Count

up_down_timestamp.description: Timestamp at which last state change to Established state or to not Established state happened
up_down_timestamp.title: State Change Timestamp

bgpBgpPeerUpDownType.description:
Indicates the state of BGP Peering session

Peering session is Down (not in Established state)
Peering session is Up (in Established state)
bgpBgpPeerUpDownType.title: BGP Peer States

bgpVerBGPPeers.description: List of BGP peers and their status from a ver instance
bgpVerBGPPeers.title: Ver Instance BGP Peers

name.description:
Host name of VER instance

Example: ` "value"`
name.title: Ver Name

peer.description: Peer Status information of the ver
peer.title: Ver Peer Status

bgpVerBGPRoutes.description: All BGP routes per instance per table from a ver instance
bgpVerBGPRoutes.title: Ver Instance BGP Routes

name.description:
Host name of VER instance

Example: ` "value"`
name.title: Ver Name

schemaIpAddressType.description: IP Address used to specify an IPv4 or IPv6 address
schemaIpAddressType.title: IP Address

addr.description:
IPv4 Address in string form with dot-decimal notation

Example: ` "192.168.1.1"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.ipv4: true
addr.title: IPv4 Address

schemaIpv6AddressType.description: IPv6 Address specified as hexadecimal numbers separated by ':'
schemaIpv6AddressType.title: IPv6 Address

addr.description:
IPv6 Address in form of string. IPv6 address must be specified as hexadecimal numbers separated by ':'
 The address can be compacted by suppressing zeros
 e.g. '2001:db8:0:0:0:0:2:1' becomes '2001:db8::2:1' or '2001:db8:0:0:0:2:0:0' becomes '2001:db8::2::'

Example: ` "2001:db8:0:0:0:0:2:1"`

Validation Rules:
  ves.io.schema.rules.string.ipv6: true
addr.title: IPv6 Address
